page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main source of employment in the surrounding area is primary industry especially{Farming and Forestry.}The secondary industries are related to Farming such as the{Creamery at Sorbie where all the milk from the farms goes to make cheese,butter,cream and so on. Also the{Cree Mills Textile}factory where local and imported wool is spun and woven. The Forestry Commision employs a large number of people.Starting with the office base in Minnigaff.As well as people who work as woodcutters, planters and many other jobs. Secondary industries also employ many people but the single largest employer in the area is the Secondary School. Unemployment is high in the area and many young people have to leave to find jobs.
